sentence.idiomatic: Ms. Wang seems to be Japanese.
You seem very happy.
They seem to be good friends.
My boss gives me a lot of pressure.
My wife gives me a lot of pressure to find a job.
I'm under a lot of pressure lately.
Are they coming to Beijing tomorrow for a meeting? Possibly.
Can Ms. Li speak French? It's possible.
Will you get married next year? Impossible.
I get up early every day.
Why do you go home so late?
Five in the morning is too early.
I start work every day at 8 and get off at 7. I'm too tired.
I must work overtime tonight.
Because I'm under a lot of pressure, I frequently work overtime.
How long have you lived in Shanghai?
How long have you studied Chinese?
How long has he been eating? An hour.
I've studied Chinese for over three months.
Have you studied English for more than five months?
He read for over an hour.
Are you satisfied with your job?
I'm not satisfied with my teacher.
He's not satisfied with his cell phone.
I think that my salary is too low.
How is your salary?
What is your salary?
Next year I'd like to find a new job.
When are you going to find a new job?
I'm satisfied with my job. I don't want a new one.
A person as pretty as Ms. Li has no difficulty finding a boyfriend.
It's easy for a person as smart as you to find a job.
It's easy for someone like you to go to the United States.
Do you have any work experience?
I have very little work experience.
He has a lot of work experience.
Ms. Wang is a person with rich work experience.
He's not someone with much work experience.
Are you a person with rich work experience?
Is learning English easy?
Learning Mandarin is not easy.
Do you think that learning Chinese is easy?
I don't know. I should think it over.
I haven't considered this problem yet.
Mr. Wang, you seem very tired. Are you under too much pressure?
Perhaps. My boss gives me a lot of pressure. I start work very early and finish very late. I often work overtime on the weekend.
How long have you been with that company?
I’ve worked with this company for over eight years. But I’m not satisfied with my salary. My salary is too low.
Why don’t you change your job? For someone like you with a lot of working experience finding a job is easy.
You’re right. I should think about that.
